text: Stanley "Stan" Rickaby (12 March 1924 â€“ 8 February 2014) was an English footballer. He played as a right back in West Bromwich Albion F.C.. Rickaby played one game for England, in 1953. Rickaby was born in Stockton-on-Tees, County Durham. He died from natural causes at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== *Englandstats.com profile Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Sportspeople from County Durham Category:West Bromwich Albion F.C. players
title: Stan Rickaby
